verbs.description: [ARG1: U.S. Rep. Jim Renacci] , [V: bolstered] [ARG0: by the backing of President Donald Trump] , won Tuesday 's Republican primary to challenge Democratic U.S. Sen. Sherrod Brown in Ohio this fall .

[ARG0: U.S. Rep. Jim Renacci] , [ARGM-ADV: bolstered by the backing of President Donald Trump] , [V: won] [ARG1: Tuesday 's Republican primary] [ARGM-PRP: to challenge Democratic U.S. Sen. Sherrod Brown in Ohio this fall] .

[ARG0: U.S. Rep. Jim Renacci , bolstered] by the backing of President Donald Trump , won Tuesday 's Republican primary to [V: challenge] [ARG1: Democratic U.S. Sen. Sherrod Brown] [ARGM-LOC: in Ohio] [ARGM-TMP: this fall] .
